        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
  var SCOPE_CORE = 'd4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2';
  var SCOPE_LE = '532da270dad21200a4656ede91f9331e';
  var SCOPE_ER = '0fcd4ba63b910010d901655593efc4fd';
 
  var hrServiceGr = current.getElement('hr_service').getRefRecord();
  if (!hrServiceGr || !hrServiceGr.isValidRecord())
   return;
 
  // Related lists
  g_scratchpad.subjectPersonRelatedLists = hrServiceGr.getValue('subject_person_related_lists');
 
  // Service table & fields
  var serviceTable = hrServiceGr.getValue('service_table');
  var serviceFields = hrServiceGr.getValue('service_table_fields');
 
  var tableScope;
  if (GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.sn_hr_lifecycle_events') && new GlideTableHierarchy('sn_hr_le_case').getAllExtensions().indexOf(serviceTable) > -1)
   tableScope = SCOPE_LE; // LE Case
  else if (GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.sn_hr_employee_relations') && new GlideTableHierarchy('sn_hr_er_case').getAllExtensions().indexOf(serviceTable) > -1)
   tableScope = SCOPE_ER; // ER Case
  else
   tableScope = SCOPE_CORE; // Assumed HR Case
 
  // Sort fields into the scope that controls them based on table scope
  var fieldsByScope = {};
  //get the serviceFields in an array  
  var serviceFieldsList = serviceFields.split(',');
 
  for (var i = 0; i < serviceFieldsList.length; i++) {
   var dictionaryScope = getFieldScope(new GlideTableHierarchy(serviceTable).getTables().join(','), serviceFieldsList[i]);
   if (dictionaryScope === 'global' || dictionaryScope === tableScope)
    addField(tableScope, serviceFieldsList[i]);
   else if (dictionaryScope === SCOPE_CORE) // HR Core fields are controlled by a UI Policy in HR Core scope, and extended scoped tables inherit this behavior
    addField(SCOPE_CORE, serviceFieldsList[i]);
   // Cannot control scoped fields that are not inherited or in the same scope as the table scope (e.g., LE Scope field on HR Core table)
  }
 
 
  // Helper method
  function addField(scope, field) {
   if (!fieldsByScope.hasOwnProperty(scope))
    fieldsByScope[scope] = [];
   fieldsByScope[scope].push(field);
  }
 
  function getFieldScope(tableNames, fieldName) {
   var fieldNameSplit = fieldName.split('.');
   var grDictionary = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
   grDictionary.addQuery('name', 'IN', tableNames);
   grDictionary.addQuery('element', fieldNameSplit.shift());
   grDictionary.query();
   if (grDictionary.next()) {
    // Non-dotwalked field
    if (!fieldNameSplit.length)
     return grDictionary.getValue('sys_scope');
 
    // Dotwalked fields
    if (grDictionary.getValue('internal_type') !== 'reference')
     return null;
    var refTableName = grDictionary.getElement('reference.name').toString();
    if (refTableName)
     return getFieldScope(refTableName, fieldNameSplit.join('.'));
   }
   return null;
  }
 
  g_scratchpad.fieldsByScope = fieldsByScope;
 })(current, previous);]]></script>
